summary: The diff implements all 6 requirements (REQ-74 through REQ-79). Frontend changes include: TransactionList component with pagination, useTransactions hook with React Query, HolderList and TransactionList integration in App.tsx, and useHolderData hook. Backend changes include getIndexedTransactions and getHolderData methods (via getUniqueHolderAddresses). All acceptance criteria are addressed with proper data fetching, rendering, error handling, and pagination logic.
